items.definition: The state of being happy, healthy, and prosperous.

examples.text: Exercise is essential for our well-being.
examples.translation: Olahraga sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan kita.

examples.text: Because regular exercise improves our well-being, we should make it a habit.
examples.translation: Karena olahraga teratur meningkatkan kesejahteraan kita, kita sebaiknya menjadikannya kebiasaan.

examples.text: I prioritize my well-being, and I also value my relationships.
examples.translation: Saya mengutamakan kesejahteraan saya, dan saya juga menghargai hubungan saya.

examples.text: While I prioritize my well-being, and I also value my relationships, I believe that a balance between the two is crucial because it affects my overall happiness.
examples.translation: Saya mengutamakan kesejahteraan saya, dan saya juga menghargai hubungan saya, tetapi saya percaya bahwa keseimbangan antara keduanya sangat penting karena mempengaruhi kebahagiaan saya secara keseluruhan.

items.definition: The state of being protected against a particular disease or infection, or the state of being safe from a particular harm or problem

examples.text: The vaccine provides immunity against the disease.
examples.translation: Vaksin tersebut memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit.

examples.text: Because she had been vaccinated, she developed immunity to the disease that was going around.
examples.translation: Karena telah divaksinasi, dia mengembangkan kekebalan terhadap penyakit yang sedang menyebar.

examples.text: The doctor checked her immunity, and she was healthy, but her brother was sick.
examples.translation: Dokter memeriksa kekebalannya, dan dia sehat, tapi saudaranya sakit.

examples.text: While the vaccine provides immunity against the disease, it is not a guarantee that the person will not get infected, because other factors can also influence the outcome.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksin memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit, itu tidak menjamin bahwa orang tersebut tidak akan terinfeksi, karena faktor lain juga dapat mempengaruhi hasilnya.

items.definition: The study of food and how it affects the body, or the process of eating and using food to keep the body healthy

examples.text: Proper nutrition is essential for good health.
examples.translation: Gizi yang tepat sangat penting untuk kesehatan yang baik.

examples.text: Because she had a poor diet, she decided to take a course on nutrition to learn how to eat healthier.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pola makan yang buruk, dia memutuskan untuk mengikuti kursus gizi untuk belajar makan lebih sehat.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I also eat a balanced diet to maintain good nutrition and overall health.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya juga makan makanan seimbang untuk menjaga gizi dan kesehatan secara keseluruhan.

examples.text: While many people believe that a low-carb diet is the key to weight loss, others argue that a balanced nutrition plan, which includes a variety of foods, is more effective in the long run, because it provides the body with all the necessary nutrients.
examples.translation: Sementara banyak orang percaya bahwa diet rendah karbohidrat adalah kunci untuk menurunkan berat badan, yang lain berargumentasi bahwa rencana gizi seimbang, yang mencakup berbagai makanan, lebih efektif dalam jangka panjang, karena menyediakan tubuh dengan semua nutrisi yang diperlukan.

items.definition: A medical condition in which a person has an excessive amount of body fat.

examples.text: Obesity is a major risk factor for heart disease.
examples.translation: Kegemukan adalah salah satu faktor resiko besar penyakit jantung.

examples.text: While some people may blame genetics for obesity, research suggests that diet and lifestyle play a significant role.
examples.translation: Meskipun beberapa orang mungkin menuduh genetik sebagai penyebab kegemukan, penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pola makan dan gaya hidup memiliki peran yang signifikan.

examples.text: Obesity and smoking are two major public health concerns in many countries.
examples.translation: Kegemukan dan merokok adalah dua masalah kesehatan masyarakat besar di banyak negara.

examples.text: The increasing prevalence of obesity worldwide is attributed to a combination of factors, including urbanization, lack of physical activity, and unhealthy eating habits.
examples.translation: Peningkatan prevalensi kegemukan di seluruh dunia disebabkan oleh kombinasi faktor-faktor, termasuk urbanisasi, kurangnya aktivitas fisik, dan kebiasaan makan yang tidak sehat.

items.definition: A lifestyle that involves little or no physical activity, often leading to health problems.
items.meaning: Gaya hidup yang kurang aktif secara fisik

examples.text: A sedentary lifestyle has been linked to various health issues.
examples.translation: Gaya hidup yang kurang aktif secara fisik telah terkait dengan berbagai masalah kesehatan.

examples.text: Research has shown that a sedentary lifestyle can lead to obesity and other health problems, especially for children.
examples.translation: Penelitian telah menunjukkan bahwa gaya hidup yang kurang aktif secara fisik dapat menyebabkan kelebihan berat badan dan masalah kesehatan lainnya, terutama pada anak-anak.

examples.text: Exercising regularly and eating a balanced diet can help reduce the risks associated with a sedentary lifestyle, but it is also important to limit screen time.
examples.translation: Berolahraga secara teratur dan mengonsumsi diet seimbang dapat membantu mengurangi risiko yang terkait dengan gaya hidup yang kurang aktif secara fisik, tetapi juga penting untuk membatasi waktu menyaksikan layar.

examples.text: While a sedentary lifestyle can have many negative consequences, it is also a common phenomenon in modern society, where people often spend most of their time sitting in front of computers or watching TV.
examples.translation: Meskipun gaya hidup yang kurang aktif secara fisik dapat memiliki banyak konsekuensi negatif, hal ini juga merupakan fenomena umum dalam masyarakat modern, di mana orang sering menghabiskan waktu mereka duduk di depan komputer atau menonton TV.

items.definition: A medical condition that affects the heart and blood vessels, often caused by a lack of exercise, a poor diet, and smoking.

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is the leading cause of death worldwide.
examples.translation: Penyakit peredaran darah adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: Regular exercise can help reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease in individuals who are overweight.
examples.translation: Latihan teratur dapat membantu mengurangi risiko penyakit peredaran darah pada individu yang kelebihan berat badan.

examples.text: Smoking is a major risk factor for cardiovascular disease and heart attacks, while a healthy diet and regular exercise can help prevent them.
examples.translation: Merokok adalah faktor risiko utama penyakit peredaran darah dan serangan jantung, sedangkan diet seimbang dan latihan teratur dapat membantu mencegahnya.

examples.text: If you have a family history of cardiovascular disease, you should consult with your doctor about the best ways to prevent it, such as maintaining a healthy weight, exercising regularly, and following a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Jika Anda memiliki riwayat keluarga penyakit peredaran darah, sebaiknya Anda berkonsultasi dengan dokter tentang cara terbaik untuk mencegahnya, seperti menjaga berat badan yang sehat, berolahraga secara teratur, dan mengikuti diet seimbang.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the body does not produce enough insulin, leading to high blood sugar levels

examples.text: She was diagnosed with diabetes.
examples.translation: Dia didiagnosis menderita penyakit diabetes.

examples.text: Because she has diabetes, she has to monitor her blood sugar levels constantly.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit diabetes, dia harus terus-menerus memantau kadar gula darahnya.

examples.text: She has diabetes and her brother has it too.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit diabetes dan saudaranya juga menderitanya.

examples.text: While she has diabetes, her brother has it too, and because of that, they both have to be careful with their diet.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menderita penyakit diabetes, saudaranya juga menderitanya, dan karena itu, mereka berdua harus berhati-hati dengan pola makan mereka.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the blood pressure is higher than normal

examples.text: The doctor warned me about hypertension.
examples.translation: Dokter memperingatkan saya tentang hipertensi.

examples.text: Because I have a family history of hypertension, I need to monitor my blood pressure regularly.
examples.translation: Karena saya memiliki riwayat keluarga dengan hipertensi, saya perlu memantau tekanan darah saya secara teratur.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I eat healthy food, but I still have hypertension and high cholesterol.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya makan makanan sehat, tetapi saya masih memiliki hipertensi dan kolesterol tinggi.

examples.text: While I was aware that obesity could lead to hypertension, I did not expect that I would develop kidney disease as a result of my condition, and now I have to undergo dialysis regularly.
examples.translation: Sementara saya menyadari bahwa obesitas bisa menyebabkan hipertensi, saya tidak mengharapkan bahwa saya akan mengembangkan penyakit ginjal sebagai hasil dari kondisi saya, dan sekarang saya harus menjalani dialisis secara teratur.

items.definition: a condition in which the body reacts badly to a particular food, substance, or other agent

examples.text: She has an allergy to peanuts.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kacang tanah.

examples.text: Because she has a severe allergy, she always carries an EpiPen with her.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki alergi parah, dia selalu membawa EpiPen dengannya.

examples.text: I have an allergy to shellfish, and I also get sick from eating dairy products.
examples.translation: Saya memiliki alergi kerang, dan saya juga jatuh sakit dari mengonsumsi produk susu.

examples.text: While I have an allergy to gluten, my sister is not allergic, but she prefers to eat gluten-free food because she believes it is healthier, and she also avoids eating dairy products.
examples.translation: Sementara saya memiliki alergi gluten, adik saya tidak alergi, tapi dia lebih suka makan makanan bebas gluten karena dia percaya itu lebih sehat, dan dia juga menghindari mengonsumsi produk susu.

items.definition: A person's emotional, psychological, and social well-being.

examples.text: Maintaining good mental health is essential for a happy life.
examples.translation: Mengembangkan kesejahteraan mental yang baik sangat penting untuk hidup bahagia.

examples.text: The increasing stress of modern life can have a negative impact on one's mental well-being, leading to depression and anxiety.
examples.translation: Stres yang semakin meningkat dalam kehidupan modern dapat memiliki dampak negatif pada keadaan mental seseorang, sehingga menyebabkan kecemasan dan depresi.

examples.text: Good mental health is essential for a happy life, and it's also crucial for maintaining a healthy relationship with others.
examples.translation: Kesejahteraan mental yang baik sangat penting untuk hidup bahagia, dan juga sangat penting untuk menjaga hubungan sehat dengan orang lain.

examples.text: While some people may experience mental health issues due to genetics or environmental factors, it's also important to recognize the impact of social media on our mental well-being, as excessive screen time can lead to feelings of loneliness and isolation.
examples.translation: Meskipun beberapa orang mungkin mengalami masalah kesehatan mental karena faktor genetik atau lingkungan, juga penting untuk mengakui dampak media sosial terhadap kesejahteraan mental kita, karena waktu layar yang berlebihan dapat menyebabkan perasaan kesepian dan isolasi.

items.definition: A state of low mood and aversion to activity that is characterised by feelings of sadness, hopelessness, and a lack of interest or pleasure in external stimuli.

examples.text: The increasing rate of depression among young people is a major concern.
examples.translation: Kesedihan mental yang semakin meningkat di kalangan remaja merupakan perhatian besar.

examples.text: The lack of exercise and poor diet are often cited as contributing factors to depression.
examples.translation: Kurangnya olahraga dan pola makan yang buruk sering dikemukakan sebagai faktor yang mempengaruhi kemunculan kesedihan mental.

examples.text: The symptoms of depression are varied and can include feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and changes in appetite or sleep patterns.
examples.translation: Gejala kesedihan mental beragam dan dapat mencakup perasaan sedih, hilang minat dalam aktivitas, dan perubahan pola makan atau pola tidur.

examples.text: In addition to the physical symptoms of depression, individuals may also experience emotional and social problems, such as feelings of guilt and shame, difficulty forming and maintaining relationships, and social withdrawal.
examples.translation: Selain gejala fisik kesedihan mental, individu juga mungkin mengalami masalah emosional dan sosial, seperti perasaan bersalah dan malu, kesulitan membentuk dan mempertahankan hubungan, serta penarikan diri sosial.

items.definition: a mental health condition in which a person feels extremely worried or nervous, often about things that might happen in the future

examples.text: She has been diagnosed with an anxiety disorder.
examples.translation: Dia telah didiagnosa mengidap gangguan kecemasan.

examples.text: Because she has an anxiety disorder, she often feels overwhelmed by everyday tasks.
examples.translation: Karena dia mengidap gangguan kecemasan, dia sering merasa terlalu banyak untuk tugas sehari-hari.

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder and also struggles with depression.
examples.translation: Dia mengidap gangguan kecemasan dan juga berjuang melawan depresi.

examples.text: While she has been dealing with an anxiety disorder, she also struggles with depression because her mother had the same condition.
examples.translation: Sementara dia telah menghadapi gangguan kecemasan, dia juga berjuang melawan depresi karena ibunya memiliki kondisi yang sama.

items.definition: Treatment intended to cure or help a particular condition, especially a mental or physical one

examples.text: She underwent therapy to recover from her injury.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani terapi untuk pulih dari cedera tersebut.

examples.text: Because she was experiencing anxiety, she decided to attend therapy sessions.
examples.translation: Karena dia mengalami kecemasan, dia memutuskan untuk menghadiri sesi terapi.

examples.text: The doctor prescribed therapy and medication, and she started to feel better soon.
examples.translation: Dokter meresepkan terapi dan obat, dan dia mulai merasa lebih baik segera.

examples.text: While she was attending therapy sessions, her friends were very supportive, and she soon realized that the therapy was helping her to manage her stress.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menghadiri sesi terapi, teman-temannya sangat mendukung, dan dia segera menyadari bahwa terapi tersebut membantunya untuk mengelola stresnya.

items.definition: The act of giving someone a vaccine to prevent them from getting a particular disease

examples.text: The doctor recommended vaccination against flu.
examples.translation: Dokter merekomendasikan vaksinasi terhadap flu.

examples.text: Because vaccination is mandatory, all children must be vaccinated before starting school.
examples.translation: Karena vaksinasi adalah wajib, semua anak harus divaksinasi sebelum memulai sekolah.

examples.text: The hospital offers vaccination and medical check-ups for free, and people can visit the clinic or go to the hospital.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit menawarkan vaksinasi dan pemeriksaan medis secara gratis, dan orang dapat mengunjungi klinik atau pergi ke rumah sakit.

examples.text: While vaccination is an effective way to prevent the spread of diseases, it is also important to note that some people may have adverse reactions, and therefore, they should consult their doctors before getting vaccinated, or they may choose to visit a specialist.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksinasi adalah cara yang efektif untuk mencegah penyebaran penyakit, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa beberapa orang mungkin memiliki reaksi negatif, dan oleh karena itu, mereka harus berkonsultasi dengan dokter sebelum divaksinasi, atau mereka dapat memilih untuk mengunjungi seorang spesialis.

items.definition: a disease that spreads quickly and affects many people at the same time

examples.text: The flu epidemic spread rapidly across the country.
examples.translation: Wabah flu menyebar dengan cepat di seluruh negeri.

examples.text: Because the city's water supply was contaminated, an epidemic of cholera broke out.
examples.translation: Karena pasokan air kota terkontaminasi, wabah kolera pecah.

examples.text: The doctor worked tirelessly to combat the epidemic, and the nurse helped her with the patients.
examples.translation: Dokter bekerja tanpa lelah untuk melawan wabah penyakit, dan perawat membantunya dengan pasien.

examples.text: While the government was trying to contain the epidemic, the lack of medical supplies made it difficult to treat the patients, and the situation became increasingly dire.
examples.translation: Saat pemerintah berusaha untuk mengendalikan wabah penyakit, kurangnya persediaan medis membuatnya sulit untuk mengobati pasien, dan situasinya menjadi semakin genting.

items.definition: able to be spread by contact with someone or something that has the disease or feeling

examples.text: The contagious laugh spread quickly through the room.
examples.translation: Tawa menular itu menyebar dengan cepat di seluruh ruangan.

examples.text: Because the disease is contagious, we need to take precautions when visiting the patient.
examples.translation: Karena penyakit itu menular, kita perlu mengambil tindakan pencegahan saat mengunjungi pasien.

examples.text: The contagious atmosphere in the stadium and the delicious food made the event unforgettable.
examples.translation: Atmosfer menular di stadion dan makanan yang lezat membuat acara itu tak terlupakan.

examples.text: While the contagious energy of the crowd was exciting, the fact that the concert was outdoors and it was raining made the experience less enjoyable, but the lead singer's performance was still impressive.
examples.translation: Sementara energi menular kerumunan itu menyenangkan, kenyataan bahwa konser itu di luar ruangan dan hujan membuat pengalaman itu kurang menyenangkan, tetapi penampilan penyanyi utama masih mengesankan.

items.definition: The process of helping someone who has been ill or in prison to become healthy or normal again

examples.text: The hospital offers rehabilitation programs for patients with physical disabilities.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit tersebut menawarkan program rehabilitasi untuk pasien dengan disabilitas fisik.

examples.text: Because she had a stroke, she needs rehabilitation to regain her ability to speak.
examples.translation: Karena dia mengalami stroke, dia memerlukan rehabilitasi untuk mendapatkan kembali kemampuan berbicaranya.

examples.text: The rehabilitation center helps patients, and it also trains doctors and nurses.
examples.translation: Pusat rehabilitasi membantu pasien, dan juga melatih dokter dan perawat.

examples.text: While the new policy has been implemented, the rehabilitation program has been modified, and it now includes counseling for patients and their families, because it has been proven to be effective.
examples.translation: Sementara kebijakan baru telah diimplementasikan, program rehabilitasi telah dimodifikasi, dan sekarang termasuk konseling untuk pasien dan keluarga mereka, karena telah terbukti efektif.

items.definition: a state of health caused by a lack of food or a lack of certain nutrients in the food that you eat

examples.text: The child suffered from malnutrition due to a poor diet.
examples.translation: Anak itu menderita kekurangan gizi karena pola makan yang buruk.

examples.text: Because the family was unable to afford nutritious food, the child developed malnutrition.
examples.translation: Karena keluarga tidak mampu membeli makanan bergizi, anak itu mengalami kekurangan gizi.

examples.text: The region experienced famine and malnutrition, and many people suffered as a result.
examples.translation: Daerah tersebut mengalami kelaparan dan kekurangan gizi, dan banyak orang menderita akibatnya.

examples.text: While the new government has implemented policies to reduce poverty, it has also struggled to address the issues of famine and malnutrition that have plagued the country for decades, because the problems are deeply rooted in the nation's history.
examples.translation: Sementara pemerintah baru telah melaksanakan kebijakan untuk mengurangi kemiskinan, juga berjuang untuk mengatasi masalah kelaparan dan kekurangan gizi yang telah melanda negara selama beberapa dekade, karena masalah-masalah tersebut sangat berakar dalam sejarah bangsa.

items.definition: A system of medical treatment that focuses on the whole person - the physical, mental, and spiritual - rather than just treating symptoms.
items.meaning: Pengobatan holistik yang melibatkan aspek fisik, mental, dan spiritual seseorang.

examples.text: Some people prefer holistic medicine to conventional treatment for chronic illnesses.
examples.translation: Beberapa orang lebih memilih pengobatan holistik daripada pengobatan konvensional untuk penyakit kronis.

examples.text: The increasing popularity of holistic medicine has led to a significant shift in the way people think about health and wellness.
examples.translation: Kenaikan popularitas pengobatan holistik telah menyebabkan perubahan signifikan tentang cara orang berpikir tentang kesehatan dan kesejahteraan.

examples.text: While conventional medicine focuses on treating symptoms, holistic medicine addresses the root cause of a problem, and conventional medicine is often more expensive.
examples.translation: Meskipun pengobatan konvensional fokus pada mengobati gejala, pengobatan holistik menangani penyebab pokok masalah, dan pengobatan konvensional seringkali lebih mahal.

examples.text: The lack of scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of holistic medicine is a major concern for many people, but proponents argue that it has been successful in treating various conditions, such as chronic pain and mental health issues.
examples.translation: Keterbatasan bukti ilmiah yang mendukung kemampuan pengobatan holistik adalah kekhawatiran utama bagi banyak orang, tapi pendukungnya berargumen bahwa pengobatan holistik telah berhasil mengobati berbagai kondisi, seperti nyeri kronis dan masalah kesehatan mental.

items.definition: Natural products used to treat or prevent illness, often derived from plants.

examples.text: Herbal remedies have been used for centuries to treat various health conditions.
examples.translation: Obat-obatan alami telah digunakan selama berabad-abad untuk mengobati berbagai kondisi kesehatan.

examples.text: While some people believe that herbal remedies are effective, others argue that their benefits are not backed by scientific evidence.
examples.translation: Meskipun beberapa orang percaya bahwa obat-obatan alami efektif, orang lain berargumentasi bahwa manfaatnya tidak didukung bukti ilmiah.

examples.text: Herbal remedies can be found in various forms, including teas, capsules, and ointments, which are often sold in health food stores.
examples.translation: Obat-obatan alami dapat ditemukan dalam berbagai bentuk, termasuk teh, kapsul, dan salep, yang seringkali dijual di toko makanan sehat.

examples.text: In addition to their potential health benefits, herbal remedies are often preferred because they are a more natural alternative to conventional medications, which can have numerous side effects.
examples.translation: Selain potensi manfaat kesehatannya, obat-obatan alami sering dipilih karena merupakan alternatif alami yang lebih baik daripada obat konvensional, yang dapat memiliki efek sampingan yang banyak.

items.definition: the state of being physically or mentally dependent on something, especially a drug

examples.text: She has an addiction to coffee.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan terhadap kopi.

examples.text: Because she started drinking at a young age, she developed an addiction to alcohol.
examples.translation: Karena dia mulai minum pada usia muda, dia mengembangkan kecanduan terhadap alkohol.

examples.text: She has an addiction to coffee, and she also loves tea.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan terhadap kopi, dan dia juga menyukai teh.

examples.text: While she was studying, she developed an addiction to coffee, and as a result, she started to drink it every morning, but she also realized that she needed to reduce her intake because it was affecting her sleep.
examples.translation: Saat dia belajar, dia mengembangkan kecanduan terhadap kopi, dan sebagai hasilnya, dia mulai minum setiap pagi, tetapi dia juga menyadari bahwa dia perlu mengurangi konsumsinya karena itu mempengaruhi tidurnya.

items.definition: physical and mental problems that happen when someone stops taking a drug or drinking alcohol after using it or drinking it regularly

examples.text: The patient experienced withdrawal symptoms after stopping the medication.
examples.translation: Pasien mengalami gejala putus obat setelah berhenti minum obat.

examples.text: When she stopped drinking, she suffered from withdrawal symptoms because her body had become dependent on alcohol.
examples.translation: Ketika dia berhenti minum, dia menderita gejala putus alkohol karena tubuhnya sudah tergantung pada alkohol.

examples.text: The doctor warned the patient about withdrawal symptoms, and the patient decided to quit smoking.
examples.translation: Dokter memperingatkan pasien tentang gejala putus obat, dan pasien memutuskan untuk berhenti merokok.

examples.text: While the new drug helped many patients, it also caused severe withdrawal symptoms in some cases, which made the doctors question its effectiveness, and they decided to conduct further research.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu banyak pasien, obat itu juga menyebabkan gejala putus obat yang parah dalam beberapa kasus, yang membuat dokter mempertanyakan efektivitasnya, dan mereka memutuskan untuk melakukan penelitian lebih lanjut.

items.definition: A condition caused by a fault in an individual's DNA that can lead to a range of physical or mental health problems.
items.meaning: Kondisi yang disebabkan oleh kerusakan genetik dalam DNA individu yang dapat menyebabkan berbagai gangguan kesehatan fisik atau mental.

examples.text: Genetic disorders can have a significant impact on a person's quality of life.
examples.translation: Kondisi genetik dapat memiliki dampak yang signifikan terhadap kualitas hidup seseorang.

examples.text: Researchers have been working tirelessly to develop new treatments for genetic disorders, which can be challenging to diagnose and manage.
examples.translation: Para peneliti telah bekerja keras untuk mengembangkan perawatan baru untuk kondisi genetik yang dapat sulit untuk didiagnosis dan diatasi.

examples.text: Genetic disorders and environmental factors can interact to cause a range of health problems, including cancer and neurological disorders.
examples.translation: Kondisi genetik dan faktor lingkungan dapat berinteraksi untuk menyebabkan berbagai gangguan kesehatan, termasuk kanker dan penyakit sistem saraf.

examples.text: Furthermore, genetic disorders can be caused by a combination of genetic and environmental factors, making them even more difficult to diagnose and treat.
examples.translation: Selain itu, kondisi genetik dapat disebabkan oleh kombinasi faktor genetik dan lingkungan, sehingga membuatnya lebih sulit untuk didiagnosis dan diatasi.

items.definition: the system that protects the body from infection and disease

examples.text: The immune system helps fight off infections.
examples.translation: Sistem kekebalan tubuh membantu melawan infeksi.

examples.text: Because she had a healthy diet, her immune system was able to fight off the illness.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pola makan yang sehat, sistem kekebalan tubuhnya dapat melawan penyakit tersebut.

examples.text: The immune system protects the body, and it also helps to heal injuries.
examples.translation: Sistem kekebalan tubuh melindungi tubuh, dan juga membantu menyembuhkan luka.

examples.text: While the immune system protects the body from infection, it can sometimes overreact and cause problems, but a healthy lifestyle helps to balance it.
examples.translation: Saat sistem kekebalan tubuh melindungi tubuh dari infeksi, terkadang dapat bereaksi berlebihan dan menyebabkan masalah, tetapi gaya hidup sehat membantu menyeimbangkannya.

items.definition: a disease or condition that affects the lungs or airways, such as pneumonia or asthma

examples.text: She has a respiratory illness.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit pernapasan.

examples.text: Because she has a respiratory illness, she needs to use an inhaler.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dia perlu menggunakan inhaler.

examples.text: She has a respiratory illness, and she also has a skin condition.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dan dia juga memiliki kondisi kulit.

examples.text: Although she has a respiratory illness, she still goes to work, but she needs to take regular breaks to use her inhaler.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dia masih pergi bekerja, tetapi dia perlu mengambil istirahat teratur untuk menggunakan inhalernya.

items.definition: A long-term health condition that cannot be cured and may require ongoing treatment.

examples.text: The prevalence of chronic diseases has increased significantly over the past decade.
examples.translation: Kemunculan penyakit kronis telah meningkat secara signifikan dalam dekade terakhir.

examples.text: While the causes of chronic diseases are multifaceted, lifestyle plays a significant role in their development.
examples.translation: Meskipun penyebab penyakit kronis sangat kompleks, gaya hidup berperan besar dalam perkembangannya.

examples.text: Chronic diseases and mental health disorders are often linked, making diagnosis challenging.
examples.translation: Penyakit kronis dan gangguan jiwa sering terkait, sehingga diagnosis menjadi sulit.

examples.text: As a result, the healthcare system struggles to provide adequate care for individuals with chronic diseases, particularly those from low-income backgrounds.
examples.translation: Dengan demikian, sistem kesehatan mengalami kesulitan memberikan perawatan yang memadai bagi individu dengan penyakit kronis, terutama bagi mereka dari latar belakang ekonomi rendah.

items.definition: A sudden and severe illness that requires immediate medical attention.

examples.text: The hospital has a special ward for patients suffering from acute illnesses.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit tersebut memiliki ruang khusus untuk pasien yang menderita penyakit akut.

examples.text: Due to the high mortality rate of acute illnesses, the government has implemented strict health protocols.
examples.translation: Karena tingginya tingkat kematian akibat penyakit akut, pemerintah telah menerapkan protokol kesehatan yang ketat.

examples.text: Acute illnesses can be caused by various factors, including poor diet and lack of exercise.
examples.translation: Penyakit akut dapat disebabkan oleh berbagai faktor, termasuk pola makan yang tidak seimbang dan kurangnya olahraga.

examples.text: In addition to the physical consequences of acute illnesses, patients often experience emotional trauma, which can have long-lasting effects on their mental health.
examples.translation: Selain konsekuensi fisik penyakit akut, pasien sering mengalami trauma emosional yang dapat memiliki efek jangka panjang pada kesehatan mental mereka.

items.definition: The department of medicine concerned with the prevention and treatment of job-related illnesses and injuries

examples.text: The company has a department of occupational health.
examples.translation: Perusahaan tersebut memiliki departemen kesehatan kerja.

examples.text: Because the workers were exposed to toxic chemicals, the company had to invest in occupational health and safety programs.
examples.translation: Karena para pekerja terpapar bahan kimia beracun, perusahaan harus berinvestasi dalam program kesehatan dan keselamatan kerja.

examples.text: The company provides occupational health services and also offers fitness programs for employees.
examples.translation: Perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja dan juga menawarkan program kebugaran untuk karyawan.

examples.text: While the company provides occupational health services, it also offers fitness programs for employees, because a healthy workforce is more productive.
examples.translation: Sementara perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja, mereka juga menawarkan program kebugaran untuk karyawan, karena tenaga kerja yang sehat lebih produktif.

items.definition: the state of being clean and free from dirt, bacteria, etc.

examples.text: Personal hygiene is very important.
examples.translation: Kebersihan pribadi sangat penting.

examples.text: Because hygiene is essential for our health, we need to wash our hands frequently.
examples.translation: Karena kebersihan sangat penting bagi kesehatan kita, kita perlu mencuci tangan secara teratur.

examples.text: Hygiene is important, and so is a healthy diet to maintain our overall well-being.
examples.translation: Kebersihan penting, dan begitu juga dengan pola makan sehat untuk menjaga kesejahteraan kita secara keseluruhan.

examples.text: While hygiene is crucial for preventing illnesses, a balanced lifestyle that includes regular exercise and a healthy diet is also necessary, because it helps to boost our immune system.
examples.translation: Sementara kebersihan sangat penting untuk mencegah penyakit, gaya hidup seimbang yang mencakup olahraga teratur dan pola makan sehat juga diperlukan, karena hal ini membantu meningkatkan sistem kekebalan tubuh kita.

items.definition: The period of life when a person is developing from a child to an adult, typically between the ages of 13 and 19.

examples.text: The challenges of adolescence can be difficult for many young people to overcome.
examples.translation: Periode pembentukan remaja sering kali menjadi kesulitan bagi banyak remaja.

examples.text: As a result of peer pressure, many teenagers during adolescence engage in risk-taking behaviors.
examples.translation: Karena tekanan dari teman-teman, banyak remaja selama periode pembentukan remaja melakukan perilaku berisiko.

examples.text: Adolescence is a period of significant physical, emotional, and social change for young people, but it is also a time of great opportunity.
examples.translation: Periode pembentukan remaja adalah masa perubahan signifikan secara fisik, emosi, dan sosial bagi remaja, tetapi juga merupakan masa kesempatan yang besar.

examples.text: While some teenagers struggle to cope with the emotional demands of adolescence, others find the experience to be a transformative and empowering one.
examples.translation: Meskipun beberapa remaja mengalami kesulitan dalam menghadapi tuntutan emosi selama periode pembentukan remaja, lainnya menemukan pengalaman tersebut sebagai pengalaman transformatif dan memotivasi.

items.definition: The stage of physical and emotional development during which a person becomes sexually mature.
items.meaning: Periode perkembangan fisik dan emosi ketika seseorang mencapai kematangan seksual.

examples.text: The onset of puberty can be a challenging time for many adolescents.
examples.translation: Awal perkembangan remaja seringkali menimbulkan kesulitan bagi banyak remaja.

examples.text: Because of the physical changes that occur during puberty, many young people experience anxiety about their appearance.
examples.translation: Karena perubahan fisik yang terjadi selama masa remaja, banyak remaja merasa khawatir tentang penampilan mereka.

examples.text: The physical and emotional changes that occur during puberty affect not only the individual but also their family.
examples.translation: Perubahan fisik dan emosi yang terjadi selama masa remaja tidak hanya mempengaruhi individu itu sendiri, tetapi juga keluarganya.

examples.text: The onset of puberty can lead to emotional changes, which in turn can affect the individual's relationships with their family and friends.
examples.translation: Awal perkembangan remaja dapat menyebabkan perubahan emosi, yang kemudian dapat mempengaruhi hubungan individu dengan keluarga dan teman-temannya.

items.definition: The process by which the brain matures and becomes able to process and understand information.

examples.text: Cognitive development in children is a crucial aspect of their overall growth and learning experience.
examples.translation: Pengembangan kognitif anak-anak merupakan aspek penting dalam pertumbuhan dan pengalaman belajar mereka.

examples.text: While cognitive development in early childhood is rapid, it can be hindered by a lack of access to quality education and healthcare.
examples.translation: Meskipun pengembangan kognitif pada masa kanak-kanak awal terjadi sangat cepat, namun dapat terhambat oleh kurangnya akses ke pendidikan dan kesehatan berkualitas.

examples.text: Cognitive development is influenced by various factors, including genetics, environment, and socio-economic status.
examples.translation: Pengembangan kognitif dipengaruhi oleh berbagai faktor, di antaranya genetik, lingkungan, dan status sosio-ekonomi.

examples.text: However, despite the importance of cognitive development, many children around the world are still denied access to quality education and healthcare, which can have long-term consequences on their cognitive abilities and overall well-being.
examples.translation: Namun, meskipun pentingnya pengembangan kognitif, masih banyak anak-anak di seluruh dunia yang tidak dapat memiliki akses ke pendidikan dan kesehatan berkualitas, yang dapat berdampak pada kemampuan kognitif dan kesejahteraan mereka dalam jangka panjang.

items.definition: the ability to control and understand your emotions, and to deal with situations in a sensible and adult way

examples.text: She has emotional maturity beyond her years.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional yang melampaui usianya.

examples.text: Because she has emotional maturity, she can handle difficult situations.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, dia dapat menangani situasi sulit.

examples.text: She has emotional maturity, and she is also very intelligent.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, dan dia juga sangat pintar.

examples.text: Although she is still young, she has emotional maturity, and she can handle difficult situations because she is confident.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia masih muda, dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, dan dia dapat menangani situasi sulit karena dia percaya diri.

items.definition: the abilities that people have to interact and communicate with others effectively

examples.text: She has excellent social skills.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan sosial yang sangat baik.

examples.text: Because she has good social skills, she can easily make friends.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki keterampilan sosial yang baik, dia dapat dengan mudah berteman.

examples.text: She has social skills and she is very intelligent.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan sosial dan dia sangat pintar.

examples.text: While she has social skills, she is also very intelligent, and because of that, she can easily make friends.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki keterampilan sosial, dia juga sangat pintar, dan karena itu, dia dapat dengan mudah berteman.

items.definition: the strong influence of a group of people of the same age that can affect a person's behaviour

examples.text: She gave in to peer pressure and started smoking.
examples.translation: Dia menyerah pada tekanan dari teman sebaya dan mulai merokok.

examples.text: Because she was influenced by peer pressure, she decided to join the club.
examples.translation: Karena dia dipengaruhi oleh tekanan dari teman sebaya, dia memutuskan untuk bergabung dengan klub tersebut.

examples.text: Peer pressure made her feel anxious, and she didn't know what to do, but she still wanted to fit in.
examples.translation: Tekanan dari teman sebaya membuatnya merasa cemas, dan dia tidak tahu apa yang harus dilakukan, tapi dia masih ingin bergabung.

examples.text: While peer pressure can be overwhelming, it is essential to remember that we have the power to make our own decisions, and we should not give in to something that we know is wrong, because if we do, we will regret it later.
examples.translation: Sementara tekanan dari teman sebaya dapat sangat menghancurkan, penting untuk diingat bahwa kita memiliki kekuatan untuk membuat keputusan kita sendiri, dan kita tidak boleh menyerah pada sesuatu yang kita tahu salah, karena jika kita melakukannya, kita akan menyesalinya nanti.

items.definition: the state of being free from the control or influence of others

examples.text: She values her independence.
examples.translation: Dia menghargai kemerdekaannya.

examples.text: Because she wanted to be independent, she learned how to manage her finances.
examples.translation: Karena dia ingin mandiri, dia belajar mengelola keuangannya.

examples.text: She wanted independence, but she also needed support from her family.
examples.translation: Dia menginginkan kemerdekaan, tetapi dia juga membutuhkan dukungan dari keluarganya.

examples.text: While she wanted independence and was determined to make it on her own, she also knew that sometimes she needed help, because her parents had taught her that it was okay to ask for support when necessary.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menginginkan kemerdekaan dan bertekad untuk berhasil dengan usahanya sendiri, dia juga tahu bahwa terkadang dia membutuhkan bantuan, karena orang tuanya telah mengajarkannya bahwa tidak apa-apa untuk meminta bantuan ketika diperlukan.

items.definition: the practice of training people to obey rules or a code of behaviour, using punishment or other negative consequences for misbehaviour

examples.text: She has a strong discipline that helps her study every day.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki disiplin yang kuat yang membantunya belajar setiap hari.

examples.text: Because she has a strong discipline, she can finish her homework on time.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki disiplin yang kuat, dia dapat menyelesaikan pekerjaan rumahnya tepat waktu.

examples.text: I need discipline to study, and I also need a quiet place to focus.
examples.translation: Saya membutuhkan disiplin untuk belajar, dan saya juga membutuhkan tempat yang tenang untuk fokus.

examples.text: While I was studying, I realized that having discipline is important, but it is also important to have a quiet place to focus, and I need both to succeed.
examples.translation: Ketika saya sedang belajar, saya menyadari bahwa memiliki disiplin sangat penting, tetapi juga penting untuk memiliki tempat yang tenang untuk fokus, dan saya membutuhkan keduanya untuk sukses.

items.definition: The state or fact of being accountable for something.

examples.text: Many students feel overwhelmed by the responsibility of balancing schoolwork and part-time jobs.
examples.translation: Banyak siswa merasa terlalu berat oleh tanggung jawab untuk memadupadankan pekerjaan sekolah dan pekerjaan paruh waktu.

examples.text: The government has a responsibility to ensure the safety of its citizens, especially those living in areas prone to natural disasters.
examples.translation: Pemerintah memiliki tanggung jawab untuk menjamin keselamatan warganya, terutama mereka yang tinggal di daerah yang rentan terhadap bencana alam.

examples.text: While it is the responsibility of parents to provide for their children, it is also the responsibility of the community to support them.
examples.translation: Meskipun tanggung jawab orang tua untuk menyediakan kebutuhan anak-anak mereka, namun tanggung jawab komunitas juga untuk mendukung mereka.

examples.text: The company has a responsibility to its employees, not only to provide them with a safe working environment but also to offer them opportunities for professional growth and development.
examples.translation: Perusahaan memiliki tanggung jawab kepada karyawannya, bukan hanya untuk menyediakan lingkungan kerja yang aman, tetapi juga untuk menawarkan mereka kesempatan untuk berkembang dan berkembang profesional.

items.definition: a person's belief and confidence in their own ability and value

examples.text: She has low self-esteem.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah.

examples.text: Because she failed the exam, she has low self-esteem.
examples.translation: Karena dia gagal ujian, dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah.

examples.text: She has low self-esteem, and she is very shy.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah, dan dia sangat pemalu.

examples.text: Although she has low self-esteem, she is trying to improve herself, and she is taking classes to become more confident.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah, dia berusaha untuk meningkatkan diri, dan dia mengambil kelas untuk menjadi lebih percaya diri.

items.definition: exercise, such as running or cycling, that makes your heart and lungs work harder and is good for your health

examples.text: Aerobic exercise helps to reduce stress.
examples.translation: Olahraga aerobik membantu mengurangi stres.

examples.text: Because aerobic exercise is good for the heart, it is often recommended by doctors.
examples.translation: Karena olahraga aerobik baik untuk jantung, maka seringkali direkomendasikan oleh dokter.

examples.text: Aerobic exercise helps to reduce stress, and it also improves overall health.
examples.translation: Olahraga aerobik membantu mengurangi stres, dan juga meningkatkan kesehatan secara keseluruhan.

examples.text: While aerobic exercise is good for the heart, it can be harmful if overdone, and people who engage in it regularly should also make sure to get enough rest, because otherwise they may experience fatigue.
examples.translation: Sementara olahraga aerobik baik untuk jantung, itu dapat berbahaya jika berlebihan, dan orang-orang yang terlibat di dalamnya secara teratur juga harus memastikan untuk mendapatkan istirahat yang cukup, karena jika tidak mereka mungkin mengalami kelelahan.

items.definition: a type of exercise, such as weightlifting or push-ups, that does not need oxygen to generate energy

examples.text: Anaerobic exercise is great for building muscle.
examples.translation: Latihan anaerobik sangat baik untuk membangun otot.

examples.text: Because anaerobic exercise is high-intensity, it improves cardiovascular health.
examples.translation: Karena latihan anaerobik memiliki intensitas tinggi, maka dapat memperbaiki kesehatan kardiovaskular.

examples.text: I do anaerobic exercise and cardio to stay fit, and I also eat a healthy diet.
examples.translation: Saya melakukan latihan anaerobik dan kardio untuk tetap bugar, dan saya juga mengonsumsi makanan sehat.

examples.text: While anaerobic exercise is beneficial for muscle growth, it can be harmful if overdone, because it puts excessive strain on the muscles and joints, and I have learned this from my personal experience.
examples.translation: Sementara latihan anaerobik bermanfaat untuk pertumbuhan otot, latihan ini dapat membahayakan jika berlebihan, karena memberikan tekanan berlebih pada otot dan sendi, dan saya telah mempelajari hal ini dari pengalaman pribadi saya.

items.definition: the ability to continue doing something over a long period of time, even when it is difficult or tiring

examples.text: She has great endurance and can run a marathon.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki ketahanan yang luar biasa dan dapat berlari maraton.

examples.text: Because she trained every day, she was able to increase her endurance.
examples.translation: Karena dia berlatih setiap hari, dia dapat meningkatkan ketahanannya.

examples.text: She has endurance and speed, which makes her a great athlete, and she also has a strong will to win.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki ketahanan dan kecepatan, yang membuatnya atlet hebat, dan dia juga memiliki keinginan kuat untuk menang.

examples.text: While she was training, she realized that having endurance was not just about physical strength, but also about mental toughness, and this realization helped her to push through the challenges, which made her a better athlete, and she was proud of her progress.
examples.translation: Saat sedang berlatih, dia menyadari bahwa memiliki ketahanan bukan hanya tentang kekuatan fisik, tetapi juga tentang ketangguhan mental, dan pemahaman ini membantunya untuk melalui tantangan, yang membuatnya atlet yang lebih baik, dan dia bangga dengan kemajuannya.

items.definition: The ability to change or be changed easily according to the situation.

examples.text: The new employee showed flexibility in her work schedule.
examples.translation: Karyawan baru itu menunjukkan kelenturan dalam jadwal kerjanya.

examples.text: Because the company needs to adapt to the market, it requires flexibility from all employees.
examples.translation: Karena perusahaan perlu menyesuaikan diri dengan pasar, maka diperlukan kelenturan dari semua karyawan.

examples.text: The company offers flexibility in work hours, and employees can also work from home.
examples.translation: Perusahaan menawarkan kelenturan dalam jam kerja, dan karyawan juga bisa bekerja dari rumah.

examples.text: While the new policy allows for flexibility in meeting deadlines, it also requires employees to be more responsible, because they have to manage their time effectively to meet the targets.
examples.translation: Sementara kebijakan baru memungkinkan kelenturan dalam memenuhi tenggat waktu, juga memerlukan karyawan untuk lebih bertanggung jawab, karena mereka harus mengelola waktu mereka dengan efektif untuk mencapai target.

items.definition: the activity of doing exercises in order to make your muscles stronger

examples.text: She does strength training every morning.
examples.translation: Dia melakukan latihan kekuatan setiap pagi.

examples.text: Because she wanted to build muscle, she started doing strength training.
examples.translation: Karena dia ingin membangun otot, dia mulai melakukan latihan kekuatan.

examples.text: Strength training is essential, and so is cardio exercise.
examples.translation: Latihan kekuatan sangat penting, dan begitu juga olahraga kardio.

examples.text: While strength training is essential for building muscle, it is also important to remember that cardio exercise is necessary for overall health, and she does both.
examples.translation: Sementara latihan kekuatan sangat penting untuk membangun otot, juga penting untuk diingat bahwa olahraga kardio diperlukan untuk kesehatan secara keseluruhan, dan dia melakukan keduanya.

items.definition: The state of being physically fit and healthy, especially in relation to the heart and lungs.

examples.text: Regular exercise improves cardiovascular fitness.
examples.translation: Olahraga teratur meningkatkan kesegaran kardiovaskular.

examples.text: Because regular exercise is essential for cardiovascular fitness, I try to exercise every day.
examples.translation: Karena olahraga teratur sangat penting untuk kesegaran kardiovaskular, aku berusaha berolahraga setiap hari.

examples.text: Cardiovascular fitness is important, and exercise is fun, so I work out every morning.
examples.translation: Kesegaran kardiovaskular sangat penting, dan berolahraga itu menyenangkan, jadi aku berolahraga setiap pagi.

examples.text: While some people think that cardiovascular fitness is only for athletes, I believe that it is essential for everyone, because regular exercise can prevent heart disease, and it also helps to reduce stress.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa orang berpikir bahwa kesegaran kardiovaskular hanya untuk atlet, aku percaya bahwa itu sangat penting untuk semua orang, karena olahraga teratur dapat mencegah penyakit jantung, dan juga membantu mengurangi stres.

items.definition: the growth and increase in size of muscle cells, which can happen as a result of exercise, especially weight training

examples.text: Muscle hypertrophy occurs when muscle cells grow and increase in size.
examples.translation: Hipertrofi otot terjadi ketika sel otot tumbuh dan meningkatkan ukurannya.

examples.text: Because muscle hypertrophy is a complex process, it requires a combination of proper nutrition, adequate rest, and consistent training.
examples.translation: Karena hipertrofi otot adalah proses yang kompleks, maka diperlukan kombinasi gizi yang tepat, istirahat yang cukup, dan pelatihan yang konsisten.

examples.text: Muscle hypertrophy is a desirable outcome for many athletes, and it can be achieved through weight training and proper nutrition, or through the use of supplements and steroids.
examples.translation: Hipertrofi otot adalah hasil yang diinginkan oleh banyak atlet, dan dapat dicapai melalui pelatihan beban dan gizi yang tepat, atau melalui penggunaan suplemen dan steroid.

examples.text: While muscle hypertrophy is a desirable outcome for many athletes, it can be difficult to achieve, because it requires a combination of proper nutrition, adequate rest, and consistent training, and also because it can be influenced by factors such as genetics and overall health.
examples.translation: Sementara hipertrofi otot adalah hasil yang diinginkan oleh banyak atlet, namun dapat sulit untuk dicapai, karena memerlukan kombinasi gizi yang tepat, istirahat yang cukup, dan pelatihan yang konsisten, dan juga karena dapat dipengaruhi oleh faktor-faktor seperti genetik dan kesehatan secara keseluruhan.

items.definition: the process by which the body changes food into energy and the raw materials needed for growth and repair

examples.text: A healthy diet can improve your metabolism.
examples.translation: Polanya makan yang sehat dapat meningkatkan metabolisme Anda.

examples.text: Because she has a high metabolism, she can eat a lot without gaining weight.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki metabolisme yang tinggi, dia dapat makan banyak tanpa gemuk.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and eat a healthy diet, but my metabolism is still slow.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga teratur dan makan pola makan yang sehat, tetapi metabolisme saya masih lambat.

examples.text: While a slow metabolism can make it difficult to lose weight, regular exercise and a healthy diet can still help, because they increase the rate at which the body burns calories.
examples.translation: Meskipun metabolisme yang lambat dapat membuatnya sulit untuk menurunkan berat badan, olahraga teratur dan pola makan yang sehat masih dapat membantu, karena mereka meningkatkan laju di mana tubuh membakar kalori.

items.definition: a type of exercise that involves short periods of very hard work, followed by short periods of rest

examples.text: I do high-intensity interval training three times a week.
examples.translation: Aku melakukan latihan intervensi interval intensitas tinggi tiga kali seminggu.

examples.text: Because high-intensity interval training is effective, I have decided to incorporate it into my workout routine.
examples.translation: Karena latihan intervensi interval intensitas tinggi efektif, aku telah memutuskan untuk memasukkannya ke dalam rutinitas olahraga aku.

examples.text: I do high-intensity interval training and yoga to stay healthy, and I also eat a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Aku melakukan latihan intervensi interval intensitas tinggi dan yoga untuk menjaga kesehatan, dan aku juga mengonsumsi makanan seimbang.

examples.text: While I have been doing high-intensity interval training for months, I have also been eating a balanced diet, and as a result, I feel more energetic, but my friend, who only does yoga, feels more relaxed.
examples.translation: Sementara aku telah melakukan latihan intervensi interval intensitas tinggi selama berbulan-bulan, aku juga telah mengonsumsi makanan seimbang, dan sebagai hasilnya, aku merasa lebih berenergi, tetapi teman aku, yang hanya melakukan yoga, merasa lebih rileks.

items.definition: The amount of fat, bone, and muscle in the body, especially when compared to the total weight of the body.

examples.text: Athletes often monitor their body composition.
examples.translation: Atlet sering memantau komposisi tubuh mereka.

examples.text: Because body composition affects our health, we should eat a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Karena komposisi tubuh memengaruhi kesehatan kita, kita sebaiknya mengonsumsi makanan yang seimbang.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I watch what I eat, but my body composition has not changed much.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya memperhatikan apa yang saya makan, tapi komposisi tubuh saya tidak banyak berubah.

examples.text: While it is true that genetics play a role in determining our body composition, regular exercise and a healthy diet can also make a significant difference, because they help us maintain a healthy weight.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa genetika memainkan peran dalam menentukan komposisi tubuh kita, olahraga teratur dan makanan yang sehat juga dapat membuat perbedaan yang signifikan, karena mereka membantu kita mempertahankan berat badan yang sehat.

items.definition: a long, thin, rubber strip used for exercise, which strengthens muscles by resisting movement

examples.text: She uses resistance bands to stay fit.
examples.translation: Dia menggunakan pita resistensi untuk menjaga kebugaran.

examples.text: Because resistance bands are portable, she can exercise anywhere.
examples.translation: Karena pita resistensi portable, dia bisa berolahraga di mana saja.

examples.text: She uses resistance bands and does yoga to stay healthy, and she also eats a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Dia menggunakan pita resistensi dan melakukan yoga untuk menjaga kesehatan, dan dia juga makan makanan seimbang.

examples.text: While she was on vacation, she used resistance bands to stay fit, because she knew that exercise is essential for her well-being, and she also wanted to enjoy her trip without worrying about her fitness.
examples.translation: Ketika dia sedang liburan, dia menggunakan pita resistensi untuk menjaga kebugaran, karena dia tahu bahwa olahraga sangat penting untuk kesejahteraannya, dan dia juga ingin menikmati perjalanannya tanpa khawatir tentang kebugarannya.

items.definition: The act of doing or saying something again, especially because it has a particular effect or achieves a particular result.

examples.text: The teacher warned the student about the repetition of his mistakes.
examples.translation: Guru itu memperingatkan siswa tentang pengulangan kesalahannya.

examples.text: Because the company did not correct its mistakes, the repetition of errors led to its downfall.
examples.translation: Karena perusahaan itu tidak memperbaiki kesalahannya, pengulangan kesalahan itu menyebabkan kehancurannya.

examples.text: The repetition of the exercise helped me build muscle, and I also lost weight.
examples.translation: Pengulangan latihan itu membantu saya membangun otot, dan saya juga kehilangan berat badan.

examples.text: While I was practicing the piano, I realized that the repetition of certain melodies was necessary to master the piece, but it was also boring, and I needed to take breaks occasionally.
examples.translation: Saat saya berlatih piano, saya menyadari bahwa pengulangan beberapa melodi tertentu diperlukan untuk menguasai bagian itu, tapi juga membosankan, dan saya perlu beristirahat sesekali.

items.definition: a group of things that belong together or have something in common

examples.text: The set of books includes a dictionary.
examples.translation: Sekumpulan buku tersebut termasuk kamus.

examples.text: Because the new policy was implemented, the set of rules had to be changed.
examples.translation: Karena kebijakan baru diterapkan, sekumpulan aturan harus diubah.

examples.text: I bought a set of knives, and I also bought a set of spoons.
examples.translation: Saya membeli sekumpulan pisau, dan saya juga membeli sekumpulan sendok.

examples.text: While I was shopping, I bought a set of knives because they were on sale, and I also bought a set of spoons because I needed them.
examples.translation: Ketika saya berbelanja, saya membeli sekumpulan pisau karena mereka sedang diskon, dan saya juga membeli sekumpulan sendok karena saya membutuhkannya.

items.definition: an activity that you do to prepare yourself for a physical or mental effort

examples.text: The team did a warm-up before the game.
examples.translation: Tim melakukan pemanasan sebelum pertandingan.

examples.text: Because the concert was about to start, the singer did a quick warm-up to loosen her vocal cords.
examples.translation: Karena konser akan segera dimulai, penyanyi melakukan pemanasan cepat untuk melemaskan tali vokalnya.

examples.text: The coach made the players do a warm-up, and then they started to practice their skills.
examples.translation: Pelatih membuat pemain melakukan pemanasan, lalu mereka mulai berlatih keterampilan mereka.

examples.text: While the other team was doing their warm-up, our team was already preparing their strategy, because they knew that the game was going to be tough.
examples.translation: Saat tim lain melakukan pemanasan, tim kami sudah mempersiapkan strategi mereka, karena mereka tahu bahwa pertandingan akan sulit.

items.definition: a period of time for relaxing or doing something gentle after exercise or another energetic activity

examples.text: After running, I need to cool down.
examples.translation: Setelah berlari, saya perlu pendinginan.

examples.text: Because I exercised too much, I have to cool down to avoid injury.
examples.translation: Karena saya berolahraga terlalu banyak, saya harus pendinginan untuk menghindari cedera.

examples.text: I will cool down and then take a shower.
examples.translation: Saya akan pendinginan dan kemudian mandi.

examples.text: While I was cooling down, I realized that I had forgotten my water bottle, so I had to go back to the locker room to get it.
examples.translation: Saat saya sedang pendinginan, saya menyadari bahwa saya telah lupa botol air saya, jadi saya harus kembali ke ruang ganti untuk mengambilnya.

items.definition: a way of training that involves jumping and other movements that stretch and then quickly shorten the muscles
items.meaning: pelatihan yang melibatkan lompatan dan gerakan lain yang memanjangkan dan kemudian memendekkan otot dengan cepat

examples.text: Plyometrics is a fun way to improve your fitness.
examples.translation: Plyometrik adalah cara yang menyenangkan untuk meningkatkan kebugaran Anda.

examples.text: Because plyometrics is a high-intensity workout, it is essential to warm up before starting.
examples.translation: Karena plyometrik adalah latihan intensitas tinggi, sangat penting untuk melakukan pemanasan sebelum memulai.

examples.text: Plyometrics is a great way to improve your vertical jump, and it is also a lot of fun.
examples.translation: Plyometrik adalah cara yang baik untuk meningkatkan lompatan vertikal Anda, dan itu juga sangat menyenangkan.

examples.text: While plyometrics can be an effective way to improve your athletic performance, it is crucial to incorporate it into your training routine gradually, because it can be stressful for your muscles and joints.
examples.translation: Sementara plyometrik dapat menjadi cara yang efektif untuk meningkatkan kinerja atletik Anda, sangat penting untuk memasukkannya ke dalam rutinitas pelatihan Anda secara bertahap, karena dapat menekan otot dan sendi Anda.

items.definition: The ability to move quickly and easily

examples.text: Usage of Agility is important.
Because Agility matters, we should study it.
The word is Agility, and it is useful.
If we use Agility correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The strength that you have in the central part of your body, which helps you to keep your balance and gives you power when you move

examples.text: Having core strength is essential for good posture.
examples.translation: Mempunyai kekuatan inti sangat penting untuk postur tubuh yang baik.

examples.text: Because she regularly practices yoga, she has developed the core strength that enables her to perform complex poses.
examples.translation: Karena dia secara teratur berlatih yoga, dia telah mengembangkan kekuatan inti yang memungkinkannya untuk melakukan pose yang kompleks.

examples.text: Core strength is important, and regular exercise helps to improve it, so I try to work out every day.
examples.translation: Kekuatan inti sangat penting, dan olahraga teratur membantu meningkatkannya, jadi saya mencoba berolahraga setiap hari.

examples.text: While having strong arms and legs is important, core strength is also crucial because it helps to stabilize the body, and regular exercise can improve it, which is why I try to work out every day.
examples.translation: Sementara memiliki lengan dan kaki yang kuat sangat penting, kekuatan inti juga sangat penting karena membantu menstabilkan tubuh, dan olahraga teratur dapat meningkatkannya, yang merupakan alasan mengapa saya mencoba berolahraga setiap hari.

items.definition: The way in which a person holds their body

examples.text: Usage of Posture is important.
Because Posture matters, we should study it.
The word is Posture, and it is useful.
If we use Posture correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The period needed for muscles to heal after exercise
A substance that builds up in muscles during intense exercise

examples.text: Usage of Lactic acid is important.
Because Lactic acid matters, we should study it.
The word is Lactic acid, and it is useful.
If we use Lactic acid correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The process of giving someone or something enough water or other liquid to keep them or it healthy and working properly

examples.text: Drinking water is essential for hydration.
examples.translation: Minum air sangat penting untuk pemberian cairan.

examples.text: Because she didn't drink enough water, her body lacked proper hydration, which made her feel weak.
examples.translation: Karena dia tidak minum air yang cukup, tubuhnya kekurangan cairan, sehingga membuatnya merasa lemah.

examples.text: I drink water to stay hydrated, and I also eat fruits to get more fluids.
examples.translation: Saya minum air untuk tetap terhidrasi, dan saya juga makan buah untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak cairan.

examples.text: While it's true that drinking water is essential for hydration, it's also important to note that eating foods with high water content can help, but only if you don't have certain medical conditions that require special hydration needs.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa minum air sangat penting untuk pemberian cairan, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa makan makanan dengan kandungan air tinggi dapat membantu, tetapi hanya jika Anda tidak memiliki kondisi medis tertentu yang memerlukan kebutuhan hidrasi khusus.

items.definition: Excessive exercise that leads to fatigue and decreased performance

examples.text: Usage of Overtraining is important.
Because Overtraining matters, we should study it.
The word is Overtraining, and it is useful.
If we use Overtraining correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: a method of training in which you do short periods of energetic exercise followed by short periods of rest

examples.text: She does interval training to improve her endurance.
examples.translation: Dia melakukan latihan interval untuk meningkatkan ketahanannya.

examples.text: Because interval training is effective, many athletes use it to improve their performance.
examples.translation: Karena latihan interval efektif, banyak atlet menggunakan metode ini untuk meningkatkan kinerja mereka.

examples.text: Interval training is good for the heart, and it also improves muscle strength.
examples.translation: Latihan interval baik untuk jantung, dan juga meningkatkan kekuatan otot.

examples.text: While interval training can be challenging, many athletes use it because it is effective, and it also improves cardiovascular health.
examples.translation: Meskipun latihan interval bisa menantang, banyak atlet menggunakan metode ini karena efektif, dan juga meningkatkan kesehatan kardiovaskuler.

items.definition: The ability to focus on muscle engagement during exercise

examples.text: Usage of Mind-muscle connection is important.
Because Mind-muscle connection matters, we should study it.
The word is Mind-muscle connection, and it is useful.
If we use Mind-muscle connection correctly, we succeed, so let's try.
